revised_title: A Case Study of the Power of Imagination and its Physical Manifestation
tldr: A 13-year-old girl, Elizabeth Dooly, developed a physical anomaly resembling a cow's teat on her body after her mother was frightened by a cow. The girl's imagination is believed to have played a significant role in this unusual occurrence, which is considered a rare example of the power of imagination.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Human Biology
